question: Question_09_(b)
statement:
Let A be a non-empty proper subset of (0,3). Note $A\neq(0,3)$. Define

\[B=\{-a\quad\textrm{s.t.}\quad{}a\in{}A\}\]

(i) Prove that $\inf(A)$ and $\sup(A)$ exist using the Completeness
Axiom.

(ii) Prove that $(-\inf(A))$ is an upper bound for B.

(iii) Prove that $\sup(B)=(-\inf(A))$.
